name: Battle City Recreated in Unity
description:
This is a remake of Battle City in Unity with extensive use of the new Unity feature tilemap.  I have created a walkthrough of how I made the game. Do play the game and highlight if you notice any bugs or feedback on how this can be done better following the walkthrough. Let's make this a learning experience for both you and me!

Instructions

Keyboard Direction Keys for movement
Spacebar for Firing
